Package Business

Interface IRestaurantProcessing

All Known Implementing Classes:
Restaurant
public interface IRestaurantProcessing

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description

    Adds the MenuItem with the name item to the Order with the ID order.

    Computes the price for the order with the ID given as parameter.

    Creates and adds a new MenuItem, which will be instance of CompositeProduct since the method only takes a String.

    Creates and adds a new MenuItem, which will be instance of a BaseProduct since the method takes a String and a float.

    Creates an order and adds it to the order list.

  • Method Details

    • createMenuItem

      void createMenuItem​(java.lang.String name, float price)
      Creates and adds a new MenuItem, which will be instance of a BaseProduct since the method takes a String and a float.
      Parameters:
      name - name of the new item to be added
      price - price of the new item to be added
      pre
      name != null, price greater than 0

    • createMenuItem

      void createMenuItem​(java.lang.String name)
      Creates and adds a new MenuItem, which will be instance of CompositeProduct since the method only takes a String.
      Parameters:
      name - name of the menuItem to be created
      pre
      name != null

    • addItemComponent

      void addItemComponent​(java.lang.String item, java.lang.String componentName)
      Adds a MenuItem to the composition of an existing MenuItem which is an instance of CompositeProduct
      Parameters:
      item - name of the composite item
      componentName - the name of the component to be added
      pre
      item != null and componentName != null, menuItems.get(componentName) != null and menuItems.get(item) != null
      post
      menuItems.get(item).contains(menuItems.get(componentName))

    • removeItemComponent

      void removeItemComponent​(java.lang.String item, java.lang.String componentName)
      Removes a component from the composition of an item
      Parameters:
      item - composite item from where the component will be removed
      componentName - name of the component to be removed from the item given as first parameter
      pre
      item != null and componentName != null
      post
      !menuItems.get(item).contains(menuItems.get(componentName))

    • editMenuItem

      void editMenuItem​(java.lang.String item, java.lang.String name, float price)
      Modifies the parameters of a menuItem. Price can be changed as well for the BaseProducts.
      Parameters:
      item - name of the item which will be updated
      name - the new name of the item
      price - the new price of the item
      pre
      item != null and name != null and price greater than or equal to 0

    • deleteMenuItem

      void deleteMenuItem​(java.lang.String name)
      Deletes a menu item from the list, as well as every composite product that contains this item.
      Parameters:
      name - name of the item to be deleted from the menu
      pre
      name != null
      post
      for all menuItem : menuItems.values(), !menuItem.contains(menuItems.get(name))

    • createOrder

      void createOrder​(int tableNumber, java.util.Date date)
      Creates an order and adds it to the order list. Also creates a Map entry for the new order which will be populated with MenuItems
      Parameters:
      tableNumber - number of the table associated with the order
      date - date when the order was picked up
      pre
      tableNumber greater than 0 and date != null

    • addOrderItem

      void addOrderItem​(int orderID, java.lang.String item)
      Adds the MenuItem with the name item to the Order with the ID order.
      Parameters:
      orderID - id of the order to which the item will be added
      item - name of the item which will be added to the order
      pre
      orderID greater than 0 and orderID less than orders.size() and menuItems.get(item) != null

    • computeOrderPrice

      float computeOrderPrice​(int orderID)
      Computes the price for the order with the ID given as parameter.
      Parameters:
      orderID - id of the order for which price will be computed
      Returns:
      bill price for the order with orderID given as parameter
      pre
      orderID less than orders.size()

    • generateBill

      void generateBill​(int orderID) throws java.io.IOException
      Generates a txt bill of the order with the ID given as parameter.
      Parameters:
      orderID - id of the order for which bill will be generated
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - on failure
      pre
      orderID less than orders.size()

    • notifyObserver

      void notifyObserver​(Business.MenuItem menuItem)

    • getMenuItems

      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​Business.MenuItem> getMenuItems()

    • getOrderListMap

      java.util.Map<Business.Order,​java.util.List<Business.MenuItem>> getOrderListMap()

    • getOrders

      java.util.List<Business.Order> getOrders()

    • getName

      java.lang.String getName()
